name: Elisa's Will
description:
-NOTE-

This game was developed in 2014 and modernized in 2021. Please, if you find a bug or glitch , comment it on the game page.

-DESCRIPTION-

Investigates Elisa's old house, rumor has it that whoever goes in there never comes out again.

---------------------------------------------------------------

I found this game on my old hard drive, which was damaged a few years ago, it was funny that the only thing I found was the unity project of Elisa's Will.

I was struck by how old it looked, graphics, gameplay, even how simple everything looked.

I decided to fix some scripts and export it to post it. I hope you enjoy it :)
